EmailTemplate.subject: Contact us | Travel at the speed of life
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://networks.nokia.com/]]> Travel at the speed of life Thank you
Thank you for your interest in our solutions for railways. A Nokia representative will contact you within a few business days.
For immediate information on Nokia for railways, please visit our website <[[https://networks.nokia.com/transportation/railways]]> for detailed resources and follow us on social media (Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/nokiapubsvcs]]>, LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/nokia-for-public-services/]]> and Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/nokia/]]>.
